website_summaries.verdict: A cute set with 12 varieties of seeds that are easy to plant and fun to watch grow.
pros: Seeds can be started indoors or out
Set comes with illustrated growing guidebook
Price and variety are both admirable
cons: Those who have tried the set occasionally complain of seeds that did not sprout

customer_reviews.title: Lovely seeds!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little seeds! Clear instructions and great info about each seed and how to cook with and use each herb. Less then 2 weeks all have sprouted and are growing wonderfully in these little buckets on my windowsill. Can't wait till they mature and I can start cooking with them. I used miracle grow organic potting mix with pebbles at the bottom of the buckets for adequate drainage. I hang the buckets on curtain rods for display when they are not getting sun on my windowsill. I have throughly enjoyed this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Morrison

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Scam. The seeds were full of grass seeds. All of them. I blogged the whole process. Planting. Watering. Growing. They ALL turned into grass. I was so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good soils so on
customer_reviews.text: I have been a backyard vegetable gardener for over 30 years. I know what I'm doing. I use raised beds etc. Good soils so on. When only 1/3 of the seeds germinate ,it makes me wonder what's up. I guess I'll go back to live plants at Home Depot or something. list of "Fails", beets,eggplant,broccoli,spinach,lettuce. zucchini plants are small. Doing well, Yellow squash ,bush beans, peas and tomatoes somewhat . Peppers are trying real hard to get going. What can I tell you?
customer_reviews.author: Rodney L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for new gardeners and gardening with kids!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this three years ago and have been making my way through the product. First of all, the packaging is adorable. Each has a friendly herb facade and contains a garden related quote. Secondly, it has a mini book that is chock full of good info that people decades my senior appreciate (and covet). I'm purchasing another one of these to use as a door prize for a class I'm teaching. 10/10 would recommend! Only improvement I can think of is if they made it so the packets could zip up after opening, but that's a want, not a need!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J.

customer_reviews.title: easy to follow instructions on each one
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I can't believe I'm writing a review about seeds, but I'm impressed so here it goes. They come in cute little packets with simple, easy to follow instructions on each one. I planted the dill seeds first and they sprouted 2 days later, and they're still alive and growing!!! This is a major accomplishment for me. I've never been able to grow anything from seeds. I'm sure I'll kill the plants eventually, but I like to garden so I keep trying. Very happy with this purchase. Update... My dill plants not only survived my brown thumb, they flourished and matured! I also planted the garlic chives and they did excellent as well. Yay! Happy dance!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Puny amount of seeds in each package. I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Puny amount of seeds in each package. I believe there were 13 cilantro seeds, and they were dried out and cracked open. You lost me
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Grow and a Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: Even I could grow these! Everything came up perfectly except the mustard, which sprouted super fast and then got leggy and died quickly. This was due to me not knowing what I was doing and the fact that I've never grown herbs before. I also had some problems with the chives, not many of them even sprouted. I grew everything in peat pellets and then transferred them into a standing garden box that my husband built. I got a ton of plants from these and still have some left over. Great mix and very inexpensive! If I can do it anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: H. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Half did not germinate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a while back. Followed the instructions for each item provided on the back of the individual pouches. Unfortunately half of the Herbs did not germinate. I was able to get the following to grow: Mustard Leaves, Dill, Parsley, Cilantro, Sage. As for the rest, unfortunately nothing has grown.
customer_reviews.author: Rez

customer_reviews.title: Some seeds did not grow well (or at all) despite ...
customer_reviews.text: Some seeds did not grow well (or at all) despite following directions and having experience growing seeds from other kits. I wouldn't fault the company, may have been my use, but probably will go with a local store instead next time.
customer_reviews.author: runningkate

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I have a couple of Aerogarden planters in my apartment so I can have fresh herbs whenever I want. I decided to try these as a less expensive alternative to the seeds sold by Aerogarden. I used the "grow anything" kit and threw a few seeds from each of these in a pod. I wasn't expecting great results, since this is not even close to the individual instructions given for each seed type. But I looked today, just 5 days later and every single one of them has a little plant! FAR exceeding my expectations, to be sure! I can't wait to eat them. :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Super good product, Lots of Extras, Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The seeds came in great packaging and had so many extras like how to grow each seed, seed stakes with pre-printed labels and the packaging I can't say enough about - it was so much fun to get! I have planted some of the seeds and they are growing fine. Will definitely order from here again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McNamara

customer_reviews.title: so that was a nice surprise. It's still going strong after about 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite the cute packaging, the only seeds that sprouted anything were the basil. I followed the directions on the packet and soaked the seeds over night before planting, but still no luck. I will say that the basil is the largest leaves I have EVER seen in any basil seed, so that was a nice surprise. It's still going strong after about 6 weeks. I used the seeds in pots, as well as in my AeroGarden. The basil didn't do as well in a pot, but it flourished in the AeroGarden. No luck with any of the other seeds in pots. I've started testing them in the AeroGarden, but I'm 0 for 2 (other than the basil) so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L.

customer_reviews.title: Helped Keep My and My Family Fed During COVID-19 thank God
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these seeds. Good germination rate and absolutely delicious vegetables which significantly reduced my need to go to the grocery store frequently (and thus avoid the crowds during COVID-19). Add to that their great customer service and the wonderful instructional packaging and I was quite pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seeds. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I plant this seeds on Monday and today Saturday I have a bunch of 1 and 2 inch tall flowers, 1/3 inch of marjoram, and remaining seeds are in their pouches because I need to purchase more soil and pottery for the other seeds. Awesome and highly recommended! Update as 11/04: Chives, Garlic chives, and thyme never sprout. I requested a replacement but the only way is to send the package back for refund. I must to send the seeds package empty? I really don't understand the return policy. I just will like to receive these three herbs seeds as replacement rather than receive a refund. The other seeds are planted and doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Ymar

customer_reviews.title: Package Came No Problem
customer_reviews.text: Received almost all the seeds in the pic except the Rosemary, which I wanted the most. So slightly disappointed. I failed to read the description which doesn't include Rosemary in the list. That pic was kinda misleading. So I'm guessing it's a bonus if it's available? Must be not be available. Have not yet planted the seeds, but I received the packets with no damage. I will edit this post once I plant them and give an update on their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF... I got 5 viable seeds ...
customer_reviews.text: RIP OFF...I got 5 viable seeds in two packages.the rest was hulls of seeds.When I opened them there were about 1/24 of a teaspoon of seed in the packet over half was hulls...I opened the cilantro same thing....I am returning
customer_reviews.author: Itsmeagain

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, all seeds come up, worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AWESOME SEEDS! No need to plant more than one seed in each spot, every single seed that I've planted has germinated and come up as a strong plant. Definitely have way too many tomato seedlings right now because I planted lots of seeds, expecting some might now come up! I would advise to plant the zuchinni and summer squash directly into a big, deep pot- they don't do as well in seed starter pots, and end up leggy. I started some in big pots, again all are coming up, and they are much bigger and healthier looking from the start! Love, Love, Love Zziggysgal seeds!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indoor gardening success!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the seeds to plant a mini herb garden on my large window front ledge in our living room. After carefully reading and following the instructions (!) I am seeing results after only 4 days! I started off with "test planting" seeds of 6 different herbs and more than three have small sprouts popping up rapidly after day 3 and more are showing signs of growth after day 4. For an apartment-renting, garden lover who loves fresh herbs and watching plants grow, I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I’m very new to gardening so I’m no expert, ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m very new to gardening so I’m no expert, but I am impressed with these seeds. All of them germinated. I started 16 plants 11 days ago, indoors, on February 25th (I live in the Kansas City area). The final plant (one of the basils) I see sprouted earlier today. The mustard leaves are currently the largest and sprouted within just a couple days. The photo shows my 6 basil, 2 garlic chives, 2 cilantro, 2 thyme and 4 mustard leaves, all growing in Jiffy peat moss pellets under an LED grow light in my basement. When they’re ready, I’ll transplant them to larger containers, and eventually to my back yard some time this Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute packaging with directions
customer_reviews.text: Very cute packaging and drawings. Love the ziplock bags so I don't need to separate and can save. Love the directions. I will plant them later this week so I don't know how they will grow especially with my sprinklers but the seeds look fresh and plentiful. Thanks. My local big store didn't sprout very quickly so I hope these do.
customer_reviews.author: Commentor

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product. I had planted the seeds about a month ago and it has been growing so well. I followed the instructions given on the back of the packet and in about a week or so, the seeds started sprouting beautifully. I at first thought the Italian Parsley wasn't going to grow, but realized that it just took a bit longer. Now all of them are growing wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly Min

customer_reviews.title: Didn't grow
customer_reviews.text: Not one seed grew out of this pack. I'm an avid gardener and herbs are the only thing I'm missing this season. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylo

customer_reviews.title: Love these! So far
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So far, I only have sprouts, so I will have to update my review as things grow. I soaked the seeds overnight and then planted them in the morning and within a few days I had sprouts! Very impressive. And great germination rates too. Lots of seeds in each packet as well. I'm hoping some of these last into the fall and that I can successfully keep them going in my kitchen this winter, fingers crossed! Overall, highly recommend for anyone looking for non-gmo, organic seeds for a small herb garden! Great price for the selection.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Growing Jack-and-the-Beanstalk Herbs
customer_reviews.text: We have one of those MIRACLE-GRO AERO GARDENS, and we've been experimenting with which herbs we can grow in abundance in the kitchen. The 12 Pack CERTIFIED ORGANIC HERB SEEDS offer a wonderful selection of possibilities. These created a beautifully trailing thyme and a robust basil. The real Jack-and-the-Beanstalk-Winner is the dill, which (in Southern California) doesn't do well at all. But with these seeds and the Aero Garden, we've made abundant supplies of it. In fact, the dill gets too big for the Aero Garden and then goes outside, where it promptly withers. But we just plant another kitchen crop and the dill keeps on growing. Love the variety and the options of this great seed selection.
customer_reviews.author: E. Burian-Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: These seeds come in cute packets and have all the information you need for growing on the back. Not all the seeds sprouted, but this is pretty normal for any seed packet. Some of them withered away as seedlings, but this was my fault for over-exposing them to heat and sun too early. I haven't harvested anything yet as the growth period is around 2 months for most of them, but I can't wait to have fresh herbs within reach! The only package I probably won't use is Borage. It isn't a seasoning herb and I think is medicinal? Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Basil wins
customer_reviews.text: So far, only grown the basil and the chives. The chives were a struggle, so I gave up. Only 2 of the seeds out of 5 I planted grew, but then the ones that grew were limp. Might have overwatered. The basil is strong though! Very easy to maintain. I do wish rosemary and lavender were in this package though.
customer_reviews.author: 馮

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds
customer_reviews.text: I grew a whole garden on my counter top. I had no problems with the seeds. They all sprouted nicely. I even looked for a flower assortment from the same company because of how well my veggies grew. Unfortunately I did not find any. I will buy these again next year and if they have flower assortments I will buy them too. The packaging is cute and whimsical.
customer_reviews.author: SchnellyBellyWines

customer_reviews.title: High germination rate for a low cost!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 13 pack of seeds and tried germinating 8 of them using the paper towel method (I've had bad experiences with online seeds in the past). I am very happy to say that after a week all the seeds I tried to germinate had a very high success rate and I just transfered them to pots! I can't say anything but good things about my first experience with this supplier. If they don't make it now I o ly have myself to blame! I wish I would have taken some pics to show how well they were growing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Rauen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, definitely a great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year buying these seeds. High germination rate, and the herbs are delicious! Especially for the price and quality, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: CritiKitty

customer_reviews.title: No green thumb needed!
customer_reviews.text: These were great, all of them sprouted and they even through in some bonus flower seeds. I started each seed inside and some outside and everything grew in both places. I'm in southern California so the weather helped, but other seeds I'd got from the store didn't fare as well. I'm still trying to figure out what savory is, never heard of it before in over 30 years of cooking! Now comes the hard part, keeping all my herbs alive..
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grow and quick results
customer_reviews.text: So many sprouts, so little time! I've gotten an excellent yield in terms of germination out of all of these seeds, and sprouting a several days ahead of schedule. These packets suggest soaking times for the seeds, tell you how deep to plant, when to expect to see sprouts, and tell you when the plants will be fully mature. Great for a first timer working with herbs! I still suggest fertilizing your peat pots (I sprinkle a thin layer of used coffee grounds over them).
customer_reviews.author: Rose anthony

customer_reviews.title: Two packs out of 12 did sprout so I'm a bit disappointed. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Many of the seeds never sprouted. Not sure why unless they might have been outdated. Two packs out of 12 did sprout so I'm a bit disappointed. Don't waste your money. Not very many sees per pack either.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These seeds grew on my patio in Los Angeles. I never got to fully enjoy the veggies and herbs because of the fires. The ashes coated them and they died out. I would repurchase and try again here in Georgia where I moved to.
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeGennaro

customer_reviews.title: These are not good seeds!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend these seeds as they don't do too well at all. Out of all just two of them are surviving. Trust me when I say I know got plan seeds! I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Buraq Amin

customer_reviews.title: All of these sprouted easily. I like how they give tips and instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: All of these sprouted easily. I like how they give tips and instructions on the seed packets. I live in the desert and these sprouted outdoors in the fall. I recently brought them indoors and they are still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: All 12 are sprouted and thriving!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved how personal the packaging was, the seller really cares about her product and customers. I didn't really go off of the specific growing instructions for the fact that I have my own method that is tried and true but all seeds are exactly what they say they are, sprouted right away and are growing like crazy! I used about half of each packet and nearly all of them sprouted. Excited to grow a second batch for family! Thank you for putting out an awesome product and I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The seeds didn't sprout even after soaking in a paper towel for two weeks. May be duds/old.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna McQuillen

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds!
customer_reviews.text: Received the seeds with instructions on how best to plant them. I started the tomatoes, squash, zucchini, and peppers and about a week later all are sprouting but the peppers, as those take a little longer! The seedlings look great! So far, I am very pleased with my purpose!!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds!  Amazing seller!
customer_reviews.text: Zziggysgal ships fast, and she is amazingly accommodating and thoughtful. I needed a custom, large order, and she worked with me closely to build the exact order I wanted. She has a quick turn-around time and is a wonderful, trustworthy vendor! I cannot recommend her or her products highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Most didn't grown
customer_reviews.text: I planted all seeds (except ciliantro) at the same time in the spring; only the dill, majorma and salvia grew well, basil - maybe 2-3 plants out of all seeds. At the same time and same place I also planted parsley from another brand and it also grew really well, but not the parsley from this set. I have a raised garden bed with automatic watering systems and I have successfully grown different herbs and plants before, so I think there was something wrong with some of the seed packs.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ninova

customer_reviews.title: Germination Success
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while now. I followed the directions on the packages and planted them. I had success with them! I have some to friends who also have had success with seeds I gave them. It has not been long enough to have them come to harvest yet, but they did germinate on time generally and some much earlier than anticipated. This is a very good deal for the money- and they are organic seeds which is important.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Do the trick
customer_reviews.text: These actually work, pretty effectively. I did a stupid thing and soaked the seeds in water (as recommended) in their own ziplocked bag that they arrived in....so not a good idea, the next morning when I was trying to pant them in my planter it was very hard to see where they went and many of the seeds stuck to the baggie that I seriously wondered if the task was not a total fail. Much to my delight I have lot's of herbs, how this happend is way beyond me.I would recommend placing the seeds on wet individual paper towels and then transplanting them
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gurl

customer_reviews.title: These are adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combination of herbs. I have not tried them all yet, but so far so good! Also, the faces on these seed packets are just hilarious... they had me cracking up so much, I texted pictures to friends lol
customer_reviews.author: HarryPotterAholic

customer_reviews.title: I soaked them overnight as recommended and planted them the next day
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat the price for the amount and the quality of these seeds. Believe me, I am no green thumb, but I was able to successfully grow all of these seeds but one. I soaked them overnight as recommended and planted them the next day. I really just got these for the herbs but the bonus seeds were a plus. These are packaged well and come with popsicle sticks to write on and use as markers. If you are on the fence about getting these, don't be! Go ahead and buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Kabami

customer_reviews.title: 100% Success Rate
customer_reviews.text: Each pack of seeds comes with instruction and its easy to follow. I did follow the instructions and pre-soak some of my seeds. However, I don't think its necessary. The seeds germinated within 2 weeks regardless of whether they have been pre-soaked or not. I planted all of them and I'd say basil, cilantro, thyme, mustard green and chives do the best for me. I live in New York City and I have a south facing window where I grow my herbs. For my soil, I get my potting soil from the Union Square Farmers Market (from the lady who collects compost every Friday).
customer_reviews.author: Rita K.

customer_reviews.title: Herb Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these seeds with the intention of starting my own herb garden this summer so that I could have fresh herbs when I cook. These seeds are really great and it didn't take long for them to sprout. Hopefully they survive the winter and I'll have some really great fresh herbs next spring.
customer_reviews.author: vega21

customer_reviews.title: First Timer Gardner & I'm Quite Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this collection of organic culinary seeds to help get my first garden started. The package arrived on time and I was pleased to find a packet of helpful tips for individual seeds and growing instructions on each packet, as well as a handy booklet which held even more suggestions and tips on how to care for the plants at all stages of growth! I was very pleased with my order and my garden is coming along quite well now! Kudos! Above & beyond my expectations, very nice to find such customer service and personal touch! Thanks! Keep up the great work, -- JS
customer_reviews.author: Steele44

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic seeds
customer_reviews.text: The seeds arrived in just a couple of days from the seller. I planted the seeds last Sunday (4/19/15), and a week later all but 2 of the packets (the eggplant and the red peppers) have completely outgrown the seed-starter greenhouse with lid that I planted them in. I can no longer shut the lid :) This is a fun assortment of seeds. The packaging is even clever and fun to read. I'll report back once I've "harvested" and enjoyed the finished product. The tallest shoots (the beans and peas) are already 5-6" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon-Vanderbur

customer_reviews.title: This would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to grow some herbs from seeds and the price was better on this package than buying individually. I absolutely love it! It came with a little booklet on how to start seedlings, care for them, and general tips for growing indoors or outdoors. There are also fun quotes on gardening scattered throughout the package. I have had great results so far with the seeds germinating. I think this package would make an awesome gift for anyone who likes gardening or cooking with fresh herbs. I've had a lot of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Sprouts, Lots of Viable Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Seeds arrived as advertised, and then sprouted without issue. I planted these seeds about two weeks ago and have had a very high success rate with them. I ignored the advice to soak the seeds since I was going to root them in peat pellets, but they're continuing to thrive. Honestly, I don't need this many seeds and will thin them out or separate out as needed, but I had a huge amount of success with germination.
customer_reviews.author: Super Me Man

customer_reviews.title: All produced plants
customer_reviews.text: Planted nine of the 12 varieties and all peat pots have seedlings coming up. It seems that nearly (or maybe all) of the seeds sprouted. I thinned to allow the strongest their space. Many sprouted within 48 hours (in a covered tray on heat pads). They are currently growing under grow lights and the cilantro, parsley and sage are potted up in the windowsill. Would buy again. Cute packaging and lots of interesting information about uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Seeds
customer_reviews.text: The seeds are beautiful:) I can't wait to see what grows. I will be planning the seeds between now and fall. I will post updates as I go. For now, I am one happy customer. So I have planted some of the lettuce seeds. I have sprouts already.
customer_reviews.author: That One Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great seed variety pack for hydroponic window garden
customer_reviews.text: We got these seeds to start a hydroponic window garden in our kitchen. Even though the seeds were started in a somewhat weird medium, hydroponic grow cubes instead of dirt pots, they all sprouted up just fine. (We had a couple duds but nothing that a couple more seeds in the grow cubes didn't fix.) Now all the plants are big and bushy and we're enjoying their company immensely. This combination pack of seeds is so convenient. When we use up these. we'll definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Dergon

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much of a green thumb but I love the variety in this pack. It also comes with a nice ebook of instructions. I like that the company used less waste by choosing the ebook. Excited to taste these once they grow!
customer_reviews.author: Dandy

customer_reviews.title: All of these seeds are great and did exactly what they were supposed to
customer_reviews.text: All of these seeds are great and did exactly what they were supposed to. Some even sprouted within just two days. This is the first time I've ever worked with seeds too so I am really impressed. The pic is all of them after only 3 weeks of growth.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Good for people who like to grow there own stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's aunt for her birthday. She was very happy to get these, because she enjoys growing plants, vegetables..ect
customer_reviews.author: Tasia Rains

customer_reviews.title: plants are great!
customer_reviews.text: First time using these- in an aerogarden/hydroponic setup. Had 100% success, plants are great!
customer_reviews.author: Cipri7

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. Love the package design. Good instructions included for each package and a cute little rhyme on the front of each packet of seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The directions are clear and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've tried about 1/2 of the seeds and all have come up with success. I've replanted a couple of them a few times and have had no problems. The directions are clear and easy to follow. I typically am seeing sprouts well before the dates indicated on the packages. They came very well packaged and labeled. Would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Lucke

customer_reviews.title: Get Growing!!!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Nicely packaged in individual, labeled ziplock bags within a larger ziplock bag. Planting instructions included if needed. Second zziggysgal product I have ordered and I have not been disappointed. Germination rate has been 100% so far. This includes the herbs I ordered last year also. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Janette P

customer_reviews.title: quality seeds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in October...yes, late in the season but I wanted to teach my daughters how to garden and also try growing herbs indoors. The herbs did OK indoors but they did extremely well outdoors. It's now July and we're still planting/growing parsley, garlic chives and basil. The packet comes with plenty of seed and last long as long as you keep them in a dry area. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lem

customer_reviews.title: Good Seeds for a Good Garden!
customer_reviews.text: I have been planning to grow herbs in my room as a Winter Garden and have found these to be of great benefit! I only planted the Sweet Basil seeds myself, however I did give many of my friends other seeds to try. Following instructions, I soaked the seeds for 10 hours before planting them, lo and behold, 10 days later they were sprouting! Many of my friends have reported the same success with these seeds! I'll be attempting to grow Chives next, and hopefully keep my winter garden growing strong!
customer_reviews.author: TheBadSax

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and fun
customer_reviews.text: These seeds are fun to plant and watch grow. I did have a bit of a problem with the planting directions as they tell you to soak the seed before planting. Some of the seeds are so small and I guess I didn't think it through when I soaked them. But once I got that figured out, they are growing up just fine. Can't wait to get my first crop of basil and make some awesome pesto. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: really good seeds overall, only one pack did not sprout
customer_reviews.text: These seeds started coming up immediately after soaking and planting, with the exception of one pack (garlic chives) which never sprouted at all. They have started to grow well and I have now moved them outdoors and hope they will continue to do well. Disappointed that the chives never sprouted, but pleased with the rest of the seeds.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: and every single student had great results. They especially enjoyed reading the booklet (which ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these seeds in our 4th grade classroom terrariums. We followed the directions, soaked the seeds overnight, and every single student had great results. They especially enjoyed reading the booklet (which I copied) and deciding which herbs they wanted to plant for different medicinal or healing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: pretty amazing. Planted three days ago
customer_reviews.text: So far , pretty amazing . Planted three days ago . I was shocked at how well they are doing . I'm using an arrogarden with tea bags filled with their sponges 😊
customer_reviews.author: JudyT

customer_reviews.title: Loved these seed packets
customer_reviews.text: Loved these seed packets. The sayings on them are very cute. The old, heirloom plants create such better tasting vegetables. I have planted 6 of the seed types already and they have sprouted easily
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Quick Germination
customer_reviews.text: All but Garlic Chives, Parsley, and Cilantro have already sprouted within 1 week of planting. Started indoors in a tray with less than ideal heat and light. The plants look healthy and strong so far. I will update the review if the other 3 types come up. Picture contains Mustard, Dill, and Chives
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only a few of the seeds types would grow for me in my hydro garden
customer_reviews.author: LRL

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little seeds with adorable illistrations! My 6 yr old son loved starting a little indoor garden in our NYC apartment! All seeds started in days save the parsley! Enough seeds for a few years! The mustard sprouted the next day and is now 3-4 inches tall! Use a few fans or they wont hold their own weight. We got 2 grow lights and 1 of those hockeypuck seed starter trays.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Glaze

customer_reviews.title: Excellent packaging, great instructions and personal touch
customer_reviews.text: The seeds are packaged in the lovely envelopes you see displayed in the product image on Amazon. In addition, all of the seed packets are safely packaged in a zip-lock bag to further protect them. The instructions on each packet and in the intro letter provided by the seller are clear and helpful. I have already successfully planted the vegetable seeds following her instructions and expect to have equal success with the herb seeds. This collection of seed packets adds a nice, artistic touch to gardening.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBER

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework before planting.
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this product. From the presentation all the way down to the instructions, this was a really good purchase. I planted on a Saturday. With help from some a seed starter, I've already recieved sprouts! It was a joy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Yakeeta Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome germination rate! Have a happy herb garden outside :) I didn't plant all seeds because we don't eat all the herbs from the package, but what I did — everything looks great (and tastes great, too).
customer_reviews.author: Darya

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sprout rate! I love these new herbs. Started them in pots for plucking. Rest go into the garden. Highly recommend!~~~
customer_reviews.author: bulldawg1964

customer_reviews.title: I've had very good results with this seed set
customer_reviews.text: Mixed results - the garlic chives never sprouted after a few attempts, but the onion chives did (alium seeds - what can you expect?). Otherwise, I've had very good results with this seed set, and the wizard hat on the sage art is precious.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. H. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: The cutest seeds I’ve ever bought. Brought me so much joy to revive such a cute package
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t sprout.. maybe it’s the climate.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t sprout.. maybe it’s the climate. I’m in the desert
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Some of the seeds were not packed in resealable bags. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the purchase. I planted the seeds in Miracle-Gro potting mix, and it felt like almost every planted seed sprouted. In the end, only a couple of the plants thrived, but I doubt that had anything to do with the quality of the seeds themselves.
customer_reviews.author: eke

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The seeds arrived quickly. The booklet provided clear planting instructions, and useful information about the herbs. I soaked a few of each seeds in water overnight, as suggested, then planted them in biodegradable starter containers using seed starter potting soil. Some of the seeds began sprouting within a week. Other seeds took longer to sprout. Only 3 did not sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Got to get this for your herb needs
customer_reviews.text: Herb Farmer.. Let me start by telling you I've bought many herb seeds, and I'd have to say this has to be one of the BEST! They have great and easy instructions on every package with pictures. I'd have to say about 90% of my seeds germinated. I recommend this product and will continue to buy. If you aren't growing amazing herbs with these seeds you just don't have a green thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Allkosherfarm

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter kit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little assortment. First time gardener. Cant wait to start planting these.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Good to Excellent...Time Will Tell
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the growth and production of most varieties. Others it was hard to tell if my growing environment was not optimum for them. Exceedingly hot and little rain, so they had mostly ground water. This year's planting will tell. Saved seeds are doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with these seeds
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with these seeds! I already have some cilantro sprouttting very nicely, an some of th mustard greens. They're growing in my aquaponics system, and I can't wait to try them. Will update with taste results! But over all best price for a variety of organic seeds and cute little educational snipits for the kids to get in on with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sound

customer_reviews.title: don't plant cilantro next to parsley like I did
customer_reviews.text: Growing well! Tip: don't plant cilantro next to parsley like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little herb garden
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was so surprised on how fast these seeds grew and are growing! Followed the directions and I am already seeing some light! Very exciting since it's my first herb garden.. Can't wait to purchase these seeds again!
customer_reviews.author: NutriRD

customer_reviews.title: Nothing came up
customer_reviews.text: I live in San Diego area and I'm in the right zone but nothing came up from the ground or in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz S.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is cool. But we really struggled to get seeds to germinate. ☹️😒
customer_reviews.author: coach

customer_reviews.title: They are seeds
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be ok ,will see when I start planting them
customer_reviews.author: Multiple user

customer_reviews.title: Party Favors
customer_reviews.text: We had kiddos at our son’s birthday party plant seeds in little individual pots to take home as party favors. We loved the cute illustrations on the seed packets.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Teacher Cait

customer_reviews.title: Good mix of herbs
customer_reviews.text: As part of my move to eating healthier I planted these seeds to create my own herb garden. Nice that the seeds are organic. Some of the seeds would hardly be used in cooking so I only planted 6 out of the pack of 12. Got results as they advertised though it was slower in growing than they advertised. Now I am eating my herbs that I grew indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bland

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I am just now soaking these seeds, so I will have to update in a couple weeks. However, I'm taking a moment to say that I will be a loyal customer. I received my seeds very quickly and the attention to detail was overwhelming. You can tell the seller truly has a passion, I appreciated the personal touches and I know you will too. I look forward to trying to GMO Free veggie seeds!
customer_reviews.author: TheeOriginalBri

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I planted twelve Buttercrunch lettuce seeds in potting soil, watered and covered them. Three days later, seedlings! It's early yet. If the other seeds germinate and turn into lettuce, I'll add another star, and more pix!
customer_reviews.author: ArtistEyeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great Seeds at a great value price
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great and enjoyed every thing we grew, all the seeds were good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I loved this cute set
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cute set! I used the seed packets to hand out as favors at a garden workshop I taught! I bought them because of the cute packaging!❤ The packet set had great info about each type of seed and how to grow, nicely done! I planted some tomatoes and they germinated great! Thank you! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: stucker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great germination rate. However, the seeds go bad quickly if you keep them in the bags they come in. The plants do not grow as big as seeds from other brands, they aren't very fruitful. The cilantro bloomed before I could harvest it, and grew tall and slinky.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: I love these herbs
customer_reviews.text: I love these herbs! So far I have only planted cilantro but it is doing very well! The pack came with four bonus envelopes of flowers! I have planted the borage, wildflower, and the California poppy flower seeds that came with my herbs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fresh seeds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality herbs seeds. All herbs sprouted. Happily waiting for harvest!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids planted these love they are organic and wholesome. The pictures on the package are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: savannahmama

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of herbs
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of herbs, pretty straight forward instructions on how to grow them and when to plant and how to take care of them. Perfect for someone starting out trying to figure out what they want to grow, I would highly recommend this for a first timer in the herb garden world.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Perrone

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent germination rate
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent germination rate. The basil is growing really well. The cilantro is growing really slow. The dill and sage are somewhere in between. I'm a new gardener though, so in all fairness the downsides could be my fault.
customer_reviews.author: LOTR417

product_meta.title: Zziggysgal 12 Heirloom Vegetable Seeds Set in Resealable Pouches with Easy to Follow Instructions - Non GMO Seeds
feature_bullets: Easily Grow Your Own Vegetables – Add your own natural flavors and ingredients to any meal with our 12 variety seed set including Eggplant-Long Purple, Red Bell Pepper-California Wonder 300, Golden Yellow Tomatoes-Jubilee, Snap Peas-Sugar Ann, Yellow Squash-Straightneck Early Prolific, Zucchini-Black Beauty, Spinach-Bloomsdale, Cherry Tomato-Red Cherry Large, Bush Beans-Roma II, Beets-Detroit Dark Red, Broccoli-Waltham 29 and Lettuce-Buttercrunch for the perfect fresh flavors to any meal.

Ideal for Indoor and Outdoor Growing – Our 12 variety herb seed set is germination-tested and guaranteed to sprout all year long whether on a small counter top in your kitchen or in your backyard garden.
Fresher and Healthier Flavors – Studies show that homegrown vegetables are more delicious and higher in fiber, enzymes, vitamins, proteins, minerals and antioxidants.

Easy to Follow Instructions – Quickly learn step by step the ingredients for gardening success with our fully illustrated growing guidebook that includes information for the novice to the expert gardener. From lighting, soil, equipment, watering and more, our expertise and resources will be there for you every step of the way.
